main event: A witness in Bandon, Oregon observed an unusual object in the sky on February 12, 1967.
interesting points: The top part of the object appeared translucent with an 'abnormal man-like feature' in it.
A 'blue-white light' source was coming from the bottom of the object.
The object was described as being 7 feet across the bottom, 12-14 feet high, and 12-14 feet across the top.
The witness's pet German shepherd dog was acting nervous and strange when the object was present.
The object moved away, heading straight west over the Pacific Ocean.
sighted object: an unusual, translucent object with a blue-white light source
photographs: no photographs were included in the report
